0.1.2 / 2012-07-15 
==================

  * change bind address from 0.0.0.0 to 127.0.0.1 to prevent EADDRNOTAVAIL on windows

==================

  * add `.expect(status, body, fn)` support
  * add `.expect(status, body)` support

0.1.0 / 2012-07-02 
==================

  * add parsed body assertion support. Closes #1
